forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning becoming mostly cloudy this afternoon. High 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow tapering off this morning. Mostly cloudy for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow developing after midnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy this evening with periods of light rain and snow developing after midnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming clear later. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Clear skies later. Low 27F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low around 0C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 20-30cm. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain showers late. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 36F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
